General.Name: Sun-Sea Construction
General.Description: Sun-Sea Construction Corporation engages in the construction business in Taiwan. It constructs commercial buildings, parking lots, schools, technology plants, restaurants, hotels, and residential projects, as well as undertakes civil engineering projects, including roads, bridges, tunnels, and other related works. The company also provides planning, design, and construction management services, as well as urban renewal, consulting, integration, planning, construction, and commissioning services. Sun-Sea Construction Corporation is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 186 Minzu Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
